entry.title: WIND WARNING , Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:01 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -11.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 11:30 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -11.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -15.0°C
Wind: WSW 35 km/h gust 60 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 70 km/h gusting to 100 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast overnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
